alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 10 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE DILLEY POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR BEA BORREGO, HISPANIC, FEMALE, 6 YEARS OLD, 3 FOOT 10 INCHES, 50 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING A BLACK SHIRT. THE DILLEY POLICE DEPARTMENT IS ALSO SEARCHING FOR MAYA BORREGO, HISPANIC, FEMALE, 8 YEARS OLD, 4 FOOT EVEN, 52 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING A PINK TEE SHIRT AND BLUE JEANS. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CASSANDRA ALVAREZ, 27 YEARS OLD, HISPANIC, FEMALE, 5 FOOT 5 INCHES, 160 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A MAROON, MAZDA 3, BEARING UNKNOWN TEXAS TEMPORARY TAGS. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN DILLEY, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE DILLEY POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 3 0 9 6 5 2 1 1 3. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS DILLEY POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 3 0 9 5 2 1 1 3.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata
